data.text: @ckgalton Hi Catherine, we have responded to your via direct message in order to assist you further. Kind Regards, Sam.

@chelseagsummers Thank you Chelsea for your response. We really do apologize after hearing the frustration you went through and this is not the kind of experience that we want to happen to our loyal passengers. For further queries please feel free to contact us here. Kind regards, Joe.

@JbnJbn185 @GroupeADP Cher Monsieur Jbn,
nous vous remercions pour votre message et désolé pour notre réponse tardive. Le délai de recherche et de livraison de bagages augmente en raison de plusieurs facteurs dans les aéroports d'Europe et du monde entier. 

Merci d'avoir choisi SWISS. 

 Leon Placide
@Fero20005 Hi, please be advised that our customer feedback department will assist you accordingly in regards to your case. Kind regards, Flora.
@Fero20005 Hi, please be advised that we have responded to your direct message. Kind regards, Flora.

@Prateek25475615 Rest assured, your case is not being ignored and that you will be receiving a response from the relevant department as soon as possible.

@Prateek25475615 Hi, thank you for your message and sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please be advised that my colleague has sent a follow up to the relevant department a few minutes ago thus the response times may vary depending on the required research and internal investigations.

@Prateek25475615 Our baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take a variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

data.text: @blazersJJ Hi Blazers JJ, thank you for your feedback which appreciate greatly. We apologise for the stress and inconvenience you have experienced with us thus far. Please be advised that you can submit your complaint online at https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI.

@boardgame_mania Guten Tag, Thomas. Es tut uns leid, dass wir deine Anfrage nicht vor eurem Abflug bearbeiten konnten. Für den Rückflug haben wir die gewünschte Mahlzeit reserviert und euch die Sitzplätze 37 J und K gebucht. Wie wollt ihr für die CHF 70 zahlen? Grüsse, Ute
@ckgalton Hi Catherine, we have responded to this via direct message.
@ckgalton We have replied to you via direct message.

@TaiPan_StraunCo Hi Tai-Pan, thank you for your time and kind thought to share this positive feedback with us, which is highly appreciated. We wish you all the best and look forward to welcoming you on board SWISS again in the near future. Best regards.
@ckgalton Thank you Catherine.
@ckgalton Thank you, we are responding via direct message. Kind regards, Vernon.
@ckgalton Please can you provide a booking code or a ticket number.
@ckgalton Hi Catherine, thank you for your message. My apologies for the delayed response. Rest assured we will respond to your direct message. Best regards, Vernon.
@BonkersEntirely Hi Arushi, kindly provide us with your case reference via private message so we can send a follow up. Kind regards, Angie.
@abovestockport Thank you for your update. Kind regards, Vernon.
@ogspotting Thank you for the lovely photo. Kind regards, Joe.

@BonkersEntirely Once it arrives, they will update the website and schedule a delivery date to be delivered to your delivery address that is store on file. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Lucy.

@BonkersEntirely Hi Arushi, thank you for your message. We are sorry to hear that you still have not received your baggage. Upon checking the baggage status website, it states that they have located one of your bags. However, they are waiting for baggage to be received by the agents.
@GeorgeCooper__ Hi George Cooper, thank you for the update. Have a good day. Kind regards, Lucy.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Big Bang Theory
entity.description: Mensa-fied best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon, physicists who work at the California Institute of Technology, may be able to tell everybody more than they want to know about quantum physics, but getting through most basic social situations, especially ones involving women, totally baffles them. How lucky, then, that babe-alicious waitress/aspiring actress Penny moves in next door. Frequently seen hanging out with Leonard and Sheldon are friends and fellow Caltech scientists Wolowitz and Koothrappali. Will worlds collide? Does Einstein theorize in the woods?

data.text: @RajTMulchandani Thank you for your reply, Raj. We apologize that we were unable to assist you. Please be advised that the ticket stock holder is Air Canada and anything with regards to the booking, you will need to liaise with them directly. Kind regards, Lucy.
@RajTMulchandani We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Lucy.

@RajTMulchandani Hi Raj, thank you for your message and we are sorry to hear about this. We kindly ask you to send us a direct message with your booking confirmation number or ticket number, so that we can assist  you accordingly with your query.
@AboveEDXW Hi Above EDXW, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.
@halafi_yohannes Hi Halafi, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.

@RhondaCotter2 Hi, sorry for the late reply and for the inconvenience caused due to delayed baggage. Please send us private message should you need assistance regarding your delayed baggage so that I can assist you further.

data.text: @Fero20005 @Flowermariotti Dear Fakhry, did you report it to the correct department over the following link? https://t.co/GeAoN7ZB4q. If you did, you should have received a reference number of the complaint via E-Mail.
@GoatvajalEra @goatvajalera Hi, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah
@LoweIanlowe1970 Dear Ian, the best is that he proceeds directly to the transfer desk (located in the transfer area). We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Dojna
@Andrew_Crome Hi Andrew, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised, we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

data.text: @Alex73710439 Hi Alex, Please accept our sincerest apologies and any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that if you want to lodge an official complaint, you can do so by filling in the form via the link https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI. Kind regards, Noah.
@wma927 Hi @wma927, thank you for the beautiful photo. Kind regards, Joe.

@MommyShetty Hi@mommyshetty, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that you will have to contact the lost and found department at the airport you last arrived at. Kind regards, Noah.
@KWranovix Hi Kevin, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised that you have been assisted via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

Always choose the window seat, who knows what you might see on your next flight. 🤩 ✈️ Share your photo with us for a chance to get featured! 📸 #flyswiss #repostsoftheweek #reposts https://t.co/JzZlgJbX1V

@SunilMaddi4 Hi Sunil, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. I kindly ask if you can provide your ticket number or booking code via direct message, so that we may further assist you. Kind regards, Noah.
@lisabuckley05 Hi Lisa, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised, we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

@whateve28713351 Hi, we really do appreciate your valuable feedback. Note that we have taken this into account and will work to ensure such occurrences are being minimized as much as possible. We wish you a great day ahead. Kind Regards, Sam.
@nialloc04 Hi, Please be advised that we have assisted you through private message. Kind regards, Ariel
@knaviation Hi, thank you for writing back to us. We have taken your feedback into consideration. Feel free to let us know if you have any further queries. Kind Regards, Sam.

@PrjnaS Hi Prinja, we are truly sorry to hear about your experience with our partnered airline, and apologize on their behalf for any inconvenience caused. If you would like, you may file a complaint and send it through to the relevant team via email on: customer.relations@lufthansa.com.

@knaviation Hi, please be advised that we operate the flight, the checks are done by customs. At certain points, documents are checked at the gate upon transiting. We do hope this clarifies. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @MatiaSantaValle Follow the given link and kindly fill out the online contact form: https://t.co/xpTYDen1BH. Our Customer Feedback department will then review your case once received and will revert accordingly once the investigations are completed. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @MatiaSantaValle Once your report has been recorded, you will then be given a baggage tracing reference number. You may use this to trace your baggage on the website as per the link provided: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH. Further to this, you may claim for compensation online  as well.
